summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Area Partnership to End and Prevent Homelessness Local Government Corporation (DAP) and the Citizen Homelessness Commission (CHC) will hold a joint meeting on February 1, 2024, from 12:00 PM to 12:30 PM at Dallas City Hall. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss strategies for improving oversight and coordination in addressing homelessness in Dallas.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order and Roll Call  
2. Public Comment (limited to 2 minutes per speaker)  
3. Discussion on the Hope Report Recommendation regarding the elimination of duplicative oversight committees  

**Important Details**:  
The main focus of the meeting will be a discussion led by Cara Mendelsohn (DAP Chair) and LeTitia Owens (CHC Vice Chair) regarding the Hope Report's recommendation to streamline oversight by eliminating overlapping committees. This proposal aims to enhance efficiency in addressing homelessness.

**Action Items**:  
The meeting will seek to gather public input and potentially reach a consensus on the recommendation to eliminate duplicative oversight committees. No formal votes are scheduled, but the discussion may lead to future action on the proposal. Public participation is encouraged, and individuals wishing to speak must register in advance.
